Package zipzop.util

Class ByteConversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • zipzop.util.ByteConversion
  • public class ByteConversion
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class used for different kinds of byte conversions.

    • Method Detail

      • byteAsString

        public java.lang.String byteAsString​(int b)
        Converts an int into a binary string. The 0xFF makes sure that the byte is unsigned and the 0x100 makes sure that the byte is padded with 0s. Because the 0x100 adds a 100000000 to the string, the 1 is removed with 'substring(1)'.
        Parameters:
        b - int or byte as int to be converted
        Returns:
        Returns a byte in a binary string format

      • stringAsByte

        public byte stringAsByte​(java.lang.String string)
        Converts a String into a byte. An integer is parsed to avoid "Value out of range" error.
        Parameters:
        string - A byte in binary string representation
        Returns:
        Returns the byte that represents the binary string

      • intInFourBytes

        public byte[] intInFourBytes​(int number)
        Converts an int into a byte array with a size of 4 using bit shifting.
        Parameters:
        number - int to be converted into 4 byte array
        Returns:
        byte array of the int with a size of 4
